assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Scorpio Tankers Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the seaborne transportation of refined petroleum products in the shipping markets worldwide. As of March 30, 2021, it owned, finance leased, or bareboat chartered 131 product tankers, which included 42 LR2, 12 LR1, 63 MR, and 14 Handymax tankers with a weighted average age of approximately 5.2 years. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Monaco.

ownershipList.organization: DFA U.S. Small Cap Value Series
BlackRock Advantage Small Cap Core Fund
American Funds Insurance Ser-Asset Allocation Fund
Schwab Strategic Tr-Schwab Fundamental U.S. Small Company Index ETF
